examples.example: 回首过去，我们经历了许多美好的时光，也收获了满满的成长。

translate.english: Looking back on the past, we have experienced many wonderful times and also gained a lot of growth.

examples.example: 过去的经历都是宝贵的财富，让我们更加珍惜现在和憧憬未来。

translate.english: Past experiences are all precious wealth, which makes us cherish the present and look forward to the future more.

examples.example: 过去的困难都已成为我们成长的基石，让我们变得更加坚强和自信。

translate.english: The past difficulties have all become the cornerstones of our growth, making us stronger and more confident.
